User instruction: Create a new slide and name it "The Benefits of Meditation".
Insert an image of a person meditating. Move it in the bottom of the slide. ## 1, image, slide, bottom
Write "Meditation is a simple yet powerful technique that can help you achieve a state of inner peace and calmness." in the content part.
Feasible API sequence: choose_content();insert_text("Meditation is a simple yet powerful technique that can help you achieve a state of inner peace and calmness.");

User instruction: Change the font size of the content to 24 and set the font style to Times New Roman.
Insert a rectangle. Move it on the right side of the image.  ## 1, rectangle, image, right
Change the color of the rectangle to light green.
Create another slide and the background color should be light blue.
Insert a table with two columns and three rows.

In the first column, write "Mindfulness Meditation", "Transcendental Meditation", and "Body Scan Meditation". In the second column, insert "Meditation helps to calm the mind and reduce stress levels, promoting relaxation.","Regular meditation practice enhances focus and concentration abilities.",and "Meditation fosters emotional stability, mindfulness, and overall well-being."
Feasible API sequence: choose_table_cell(0, 0);insert_text("Mindfulness Meditation");choose_table_cell(1, 0);insert_text("Transcendental Meditation");choose_table_cell(2, 0);insert_text("Body Scan Meditation");choose_table_cell(0, 1);insert_text("Meditation helps to calm the mind and reduce stress levels, promoting relaxation.");choose_table_cell(1, 1);insert_text("Regular meditation practice enhances focus and concentration abilities.");choose_table_cell(2, 1);insert_text("Meditation fosters emotional stability, mindfulness, and overall well-being.");
